name: One On One霍尔与奥兹二重唱82年排行第七名单曲
lyric:
I'm tired of playing on the team
Ooh it seems I don't get time out anymore ooh
Ooh, I-d-a-change if we set the pace face to face
No, I won't even try to score oh

And oh, oh I can feel the magic of your touch
Mm and when you move in close a little bit means so much
And ooh yeah, you've got to understand baby
Time out is what I'm here for oh oh

One on one, I wanna play that game tonight
One on one I know, I wanna play that
One on one I wanna play that game tonight
One on one so slow ooh

Ooh, you can't tell me you don't miss me boy
No I think I might know you too well
I'd do say if you knew that I was coming tonight
I want you, can't you tell, ooh

One on one, I wanna play that game tonight
One on one I know, I wanna play that
One on one I wanna play that game tonight
One on one so slow ooh

That's all you need to know now'
Oh if it's really right
There's nothing else'rnmh

One on one I wanna play that game tonight
One on one I wanna play that game tonight

Ooh, I don't want no one else
I'm tired of playing' don't wannaplay those games no more,
no more and when you move in close
A little bit means so much
